translations: n．书籍爱好者，藏书家：热爱书籍、收藏书籍的人。
· Bibliophiles often have extensive book collections.
书籍爱好者通常拥有丰富的藏书。

sentences.sentence: Some of the most committed bibliophiles maintain an almost fetishistic devotion to the physical book.
sentences.translation: 一些最热诚的藏书家，对于实体书籍，有着一种近于迷信的热爱。

sentences.sentence: Several thousand Nepali bibliophiles, most of them young, are expected to attend three days of fizzing discussion.
sentences.translation: 预计几千名尼泊尔爱书人将参加持续三天的热烈讨论，其中大部分都将是年轻人。
